attributes.action: Nominate Ross Brawn for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ross Brawn has guided many Formula 1 World Titles victories for many different F1 teams and has now brought a failed team, belonging to a world multi-national company, to a glorious World Championship for the team and a very popular British driver.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
